CustomField.description: This field captures interest rate change action based on 'Interest Rate Change Action' field value on 'Lending Product' object at the time of rate change. Empty/blank - Keeps the current schedule Keep Same Payment Amount - Changes loan maturity date keeping same installment Change Payment Amount - Changes installment amount keeping same maturity date
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field captures interest rate change action based on 'Interest Rate Change Action' field value on 'Lending Product' object at the time of rate change
CustomField.label: Interest Rate Change Action
